attributes.action: look at how many petitions, marches and outcry against Israeli attacks on Palestine still hinder him from representing the people who voted him into power to represent them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are we allowing a democratic state to (again) cause suffering to people who have been weakened in prison like conditions for decades.  A state that we the British created and have to be held accountable for.  This is genocide in the most tortourous manner.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
